entry.title: VHB-6 (red aurora xbag)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bags
Price: 18.50

These hand felted cross-body bags are inspirations from True North, wild and free. From our mighty Moose to Beaver; Northern Lights to wind swept Pines. Our northern collection are carefully crafted to create lasting impressions.

  • Handmade from natural sheep wool using wet felting technique
  • Seamless bag one compartment with pocket inside
  • Adjustable long canvas strap to wear it on the shoulder/cross body.
  • Flap with zipper closer inside
  • Interior cotton lined

size: 10" L x 9.5" Ht. Strap length is up to 53"

composition: 100% Wool. Metal Findings. Canvas strap.
care: Hand wash in tepid water with mild detergents. Hang dry.

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: VHB-9 (riveria tote)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bags
Price: 40.00

The Riveria tote was inspired by the deep forest water fall and rivers. Structurally simple yet delightfully felted. This bag just makes everyone happy! It has all the convenience and simplicity of a tote, that adds so much more.

  • Closes with a zipper
  • Made out of one piece, meaning no seam
  • Interior cotton linning
  • Features an interior patch pocket
  • Tanned leather straps

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not twist. Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach. 
Size: ﻿17” ht. x 15” width x 4” depth


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: ABB1 (yoga bag)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bags
Price: 25.00

Pack up for your next getaway with our Black Buddha Weekender crossbody bag. Designed in durable canvas, it features an extra roomy interior, wide strap handles for carrying crossbody over the shoulder, a wooden button closure to keep all of your valuable secure, and an interior pocket for easy access to keys, mobile devices, and important items alike.
  • Top crossbody handles.
  • Large interior.
  • Flat base.
  • Interior pocket.
  • Screen printed graphics

 

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: WB13 (tote bag)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bags
Price: 20.00

Hamro specializes in back strap weaving and all products are Azo free and individually dyed by color. Our bags are made of 100% Cotton using thick and thinner thread and are also available in natural colors as well as made of recycled cotton minimizing the environmental impacts.

Through the sourcing and use of local raw materials, our bags are made exclusively by hand with lot of dedication by our artisans.

  • Interior has one large pocket
  • Zipper closure
  • Exterior pocketsHandåÊ

composition: 100% Handwoven Cotton
care: Hand wash with neutral detergent and dry in the shade


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: VHB-7 (safari xbag)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bags
Price: 18.00

Perfect X-body bag for daily use!

This Safari inspired cross-body bag is designed to store the essentials. Our cross-body bags are very popular, they are comfortable and serves as the multi-function accessory, perfectly suitable for all occasions.

  • Handmade from natural sheep wool using wet felting technique
  • Seamless bag one compartment with pocket inside
  • Adjustable long canvas strap to wear it on the shoulder/cross body.
  • Flap with zipper closer inside
  • Interior cotton lined

size: 10" L x 9.5" Ht. Strap length is up to 53"

composition: 100% Wool. Metal Findings. Canvas strap.
care: Hand wash in tepid water with mild detergents. Hang dry.
